function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Convenience sampling of undergraduate and MBA students may not be representative of the general population","Impact":"Findings may not generalize to the broader population, limiting the applicability of the results","Mitigation":"Use stratified sampling to ensure representation from different demographic groups","Technologies":"Statistical software for stratified sampling","People":"Undergraduate and MBA students, general population","Owner":"Researcher, data collection team"},{"Description":"Influence of political ideology on consumer perceptions and behaviors related to the coronavirus","Impact":"Biased responses and behaviors based on political beliefs, leading to skewed data and conclusions","Mitigation":"Analyze and report findings based on political ideology as a variable, and consider subgroup analysis","Technologies":"Statistical software for subgroup analysis","People":"Survey respondents, general population","Owner":"Researcher, data analysis team"},{"Description":"Coronavirus pandemic context may influence responses and behaviors","Impact":"Responses and behaviors may be influenced by the unique circumstances of the pandemic, affecting the generalizability of the findings","Mitigation":"Consider contextual factors in the analysis and interpretation of results","Technologies":"Data analysis software for contextual analysis","People":"Survey respondents, general population","Owner":"Researcher, data analysis team"}]}
